text: The Last American Hero (also known as Hard Driver) is a 1973 sports drama movie based on the true story NASCAR driver Junior Johnson. It was directed by Lamont Johnson and stars Jeff Bridges, Geraldine Fitzgerald, Ned Beatty, Gary Busey, Ed Lauter and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:1973 drama movies Category:1970s biographical movies Category:1970s sports movies Category:American sports drama movies Category:American biographical movies Category:Movies directed by Lamont Johnson
title: The Last American Hero
